mapper.select: select a.no as no, a.g_no as gNo, a.m_no as mNo, a.name as name from hash a left outer join memo b on a.g_no=b.g_no where b.u_no=#{uNo} and a.g_no=#{gNo} union select a.no as no, a.g_no as gNo, a.m_no as mNo, a.name as name from hash a right outer join memo b on a.m_no=b.no where b.u_no=3{uNo} and a.g_no=#{gNo};
